En.VENUSAUR_PA1_TEXT_1: When HP is 30% or less; increase all damage dealt by 20%.
En.VENUSAUR_BA1_TEXT_1: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack; becoming a vine whip that strikes twice and pulls enemies between both vines then applies a 20% slow for 1.5s.
En.VENUSAUR_MOVE_SEED_BOMB_TEXT_1: Venusaur hurls a large seed to the designated location, damaging all enemies in the radius.
En.VENUSAUR_MOVE_SLUDGE_BOMB_TEXT_1: Venusaur hurls toxic sludge to the designated location, damaging, slowing movement speed by 35% for 1s (stacking with the radius slow), and poisoning all enemies in the radius when it lands. The sludge lingers; damaging enemies every 0.5s for 5s in the radius, slowing them by 45%, and reducing their Sp. Defense by 30% for 1s (refreshes every tick).
En.VENUSAUR_MOVE_GIGA_DRAIN_TEXT_1: Venusaur emits a cone-shaped blast in the designated direction, damaging enemies and restoring health when it hits. Venusaur also takes 35% reduced damage for 2.5s. This move's healing is not increased by Venusaur's passive.
En.VENUSAUR_MOVE_RAZOR_LEAF_TEXT_1: Venusaur launches a barrage of sharp-edged leaves in the designated direction, damaging enemies 10 times over 0.75s.
En.VENUSAUR_MOVE_SOLAR_BEAM_TEXT_1: Venusaur charges for 0.7s before firing a beam of light in the designated direction, damaging enemies several times over 0.3s. It is randomly divided into several distinct hits, with 10 ticks of damage divided among these hits. Half of the ticks deal damage solely based on the enemies' Max HP. Against Wild Pokémon: Each tick is capped at 450 damage and the total damage is capped at 2250.
En.VENUSAUR_MOVE_SOLAR_BEAM_TEXT_2: Reduced cast time to 0.6s and cooldown is further reduced by 2s.
En.VENUSAUR_MOVE_PETAL_DANCE_TEXT_1: Venusaur scatters petals around themself for 4.8s, increasing movement speed by 90% and damaging enemies every 0.3s in the radius (for a total of 16 damage ticks). This movement speed increase slowly decays during the duration of this move by 9% every every 0.5s. Petal Dance reduces the cooldown of Sludge Bomb or Giga Drain by 30% of the current remaining cooldown, per tick of damage that hit an enemy player (hitting multiple enemies reduces the cooldown more).
En.VENUSAUR_MOVE_VERDANT_ANGER_TEXT_1: Venusaur hurls a massive seed to the designated location, damaging all enemies in the radius and slowing them by 35% for 1s. The seed then splits apart into 4 smaller seeds, each damaging all enemies in their radius.
En.VENUSAUR_MOVE_VERDANT_ANGER_TEXT_2: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

Cn.VENUSAUR_PA1_TEXT_1: 当自身体力在 30% 及以下时，所有造成的伤害提高 20%。
Cn.VENUSAUR_BA1_TEXT_1: 第三次普通攻击为强化普通攻击，命中时造成更高的伤害并将敌人拖拽到藤蔓的中心部，然后施加 20% 的减速效果，持续 1.5 秒。
Cn.VENUSAUR_MOVE_SEED_BOMB_TEXT_1: 向指定位置投掷一颗大种子，对范围内的所有敌人造成伤害。
Cn.VENUSAUR_MOVE_SLUDGE_BOMB_TEXT_1: 向指定位置投掷污泥，对敌人造成伤害，并降低其移动速度 35%，持续 1 秒（可与范围减速叠加），并在落地时使范围内的所有敌人中毒。污泥可存在 5 秒，每 0.5 秒对范围的敌人造成一次伤害，使他们减速 45%，并使他们的特防降低 30%，持续 1 秒（每秒刷新一次）。
Cn.VENUSAUR_MOVE_GIGA_DRAIN_TEXT_1: 吸取范围内敌人的体力。招式命中时对敌人造成伤害并恢复自身的体力。随后减少自身受到的伤害 35% ，持续 2.5 秒。此招式的治疗效果不会因自身的特性而增加。
Cn.VENUSAUR_MOVE_RAZOR_LEAF_TEXT_1: 向指定方向发射一连串锋利的树叶，在 0.75 秒内对敌人造成 10 次伤害。
Cn.VENUSAUR_MOVE_SOLAR_BEAM_TEXT_1: 施法 0.7 秒，然后向指定方向发射光束，在 0.3 秒内对敌人造成数次伤害。它被随机分成几个不同的命中，10 次伤害在这些命中中分配。一半的伤害只根据敌人的最大体力值造成伤害。对野生宝可梦：每次伤害上限为 450，总伤害上限为 2250。
Cn.VENUSAUR_MOVE_SOLAR_BEAM_TEXT_2: 施法时间减少至 0.6 秒，间隔时间减少 2 秒。
Cn.VENUSAUR_MOVE_PETAL_DANCE_TEXT_1: 散布花瓣围绕自身，持续 4.8 秒，移动速度提高 90%，并且每 0.3 秒对范围内的敌人造成伤害（共会造成 16 次伤害）。此招式速度增加在该招式的持续时间内每 0.5 秒缓慢衰减 9%。每对一名敌方玩家造成一次伤害，会减少「污泥炸弹」或「终极吸取」的当前剩余间隔时间 30% （击中多个敌人会减少更多间隔时间）。
Cn.VENUSAUR_MOVE_VERDANT_ANGER_TEXT_1: 向指定位置投掷一颗巨大的种子，对范围内的所有敌人造成伤害并使其减速 35%，持续 1 秒。然后种子分裂成 4 个较小的种子，每个种子对其范围内的所有敌人造成伤害。
Cn.VENUSAUR_MOVE_VERDANT_ANGER_TEXT_2: 30% 移动速度，30% 冷却缩减，20% 最大体力值护盾
